meanings.definition: Made uniform or similar in composition
meanings.sent1: The homogenized mixture had a consistent texture throughout.
meanings.sent2: The milk was homogenized to ensure it was evenly mixed.
meanings.sent3: The homogenized colors of the painting gave it a harmonious look.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sounded homogenized, lacking any distinct accent.
meanings.sent5: The homogenized blend of spices created a perfectly balanced flavor.

meanings.definition: Processed to make a mixture the same throughout
meanings.sent1: The homogenized solution was ready for use in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The homogenized yogurt had a smooth and creamy texture.
meanings.sent3: The homogenized ingredients in the cake made it taste deliciously consistent.
meanings.sent4: The homogenized music played in the background, creating a seamless atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The homogenized distribution of resources ensured fairness among all participants.
